thread.title: British gaming firm enlists army of players to create Worlds Adrift

title: British gaming firm enlists army of players to create Worlds Adrift
text:
British gaming firm enlists army of players to create Worlds Adrift 3:02am EDT - 01:41
British game maker Bossa Studios releases Worlds Adrift, an ambitious adventure game designed that has taken three years and the up-front involvement of 50,000 gamers to create. Stuart McDill was at the launch.
